definitions.definition: Anything with a slender curved shape, resembling the neck of a goose , such as the shaft of some lamps.
examples: A gooseneck lamp can be swiveled around an object, allowing a good examination of all its surfaces.

definitions.definition: The swivel connection on a sailboat located near the bottom of the mast that the boom attaches to. When a sailboat performs a tack or a jibe the gooseneck swings the boom from one side of the boat to the other.

main_definition: ( often attributive ) Anything with a slender curved shape, resembling the neck of a goose , such as the shaft of some lamps.
secondary_definitions: ( nautical ) The swivel connection on a sailboat located near the bottom of the mast that the boom attaches to. When a sailboat performs a tack or a jibe the gooseneck swings the boom from one side of the boat to the other.
